author: farhan
title: DO NOT PAY TO READ 154 MEDIA STRAITS TIMES, USE THIS TRICK TO GET IT FREE
text:
DO NOT PAY TO READ 154 MEDIA STRAITS TIMES, USE THIS TRICK TO GET IT FREE   
<Credits: Boycott Straits Times & Zaobao> Advertisement 
Dear friends, are there times when you try to access a Straits Times article and receive this message telling you to sign up because you have reached the 15-article a month limit? 
Please do not sign up as this means releasing your personal details to the lapdog sheet. 
Furthermore, every sign-up is used by the Straits Times to add to its readership base to boast to advertisers that it has many readers. 
To continue accessing the article without signing up, just tap on the icon on the top left corner of the browser. The article will appear in reader-friendly format.
